IndexPage.title: next-intl-example
IndexPage.description: This is a basic example that demonstrates the usage of next-intl with the Next.js App Try changing the locale in the top right corner and see how the content changes.

LocaleSwitcher.label: Change language
LocaleSwitcher.locale: {locale, select, de { Deutsh } en { English } other { Unknown }}

slide1.title: Modern Software Development
slide1.description: Build high-performance applications using modern frameworks, clean architecture, and scalable development practices.

slide2.title: Cloud & Infrastructure
slide2.description: Deploy, scale, and manage applications seamlessly with cloud-native infrastructure and DevOps automation.

slide3.title: AI & Machine Learning
slide3.description: Leverage artificial intelligence and machine learning to automate workflows and unlock smarter decision-making.

slide4.title: Cybersecurity Solutions
slide4.description: Protect your systems and data with enterprise-grade security, monitoring, and compliance-ready solutions.

slide5.title: Data Analytics & Insights
slide5.description: Transform raw data into actionable insights with real-time analytics, dashboards, and reporting tools.

RootPage.title: Why should you use this landing page
RootPage.description: Nextly is a free landing page & marketing website template for startups and indie projects. Its built with Next.js & TailwindCSS. And its completely open-source.
RootPage.sectionDesc: Learn how to fullfil your needs
RootPage.sectionInfo: This section is to highlight a promo or demo video of your product. Analysts says a landing page with video has 3% more conversion rate. So, don't forget to add one. Just like this.
RootPage.testInfo: Testimonials is a great way to increase the brand trust and awareness. Use this section to highlight your popular customers.
RootPage.faqDesc: Answer your customers possible questions here, it will increase the conversion rate as well as support or chat requests.
RootPage.tryMoreSectionText2: Don't let your visitors see a poor landing.
RootPage.footerText: Nextly is a free landing page & marketing website template for startups and indie projects. Its built with Next.js & TailwindCSS. And its completely open-source.

Data.title: Highlight your benefits
Data.desc: You can use this space to highlight your first benefit or a feature of your product. It can also contain an image or Illustration like in the example along with some bullet points.

point1.title: Understand your customers
point1.desc: Then explain the first point breifly in one or two lines.

point2.title: Improve acquisition
point2.desc: Here you can add the next benefit point.

point3.title: Drive customer retention
point3.desc: This will be your last bullet point in this section.

pt1.question: Is this template completely free to use?
pt1.answer: Yes, this template is completely free to use.

pt2.question: Can I use it in a commercial project?

pt3.question: What is your refund policy?
pt3.answer: If you're unhappy with your purchase for any reason, email us within 90 days and we'll refund you in full, no questions asked.

pt4.question: Do you offer technical support?
pt4.answer: No, we don't offer technical support for free downloads. Please purchase a support plan to get 6 months of support.

Testimonials.test1: Share a real <Mark>testimonial</Mark> that hits some of your benefits from one of your popular customer.
Testimonials.test2: Make sure you only pick the <Mark>right sentence</Mark> to keep it short and simple that u have achieve.
Testimonials.test3: This is an <Mark>awesome</Mark> landing page template I've seen. I would use this for anything.
